creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: grey, black and white; snow on rock formations and trees; trees at center and LLC
inscription:
衣食非不拙　夏道臥衡門　金銭非不貴　積善遺児孫

Poem: Seisho sanbō shū no. 234
markings: poem UL red seal: 无心 {mushin} [mushin #2]; poem LL red seals: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #4]; 静處 {seisho} [seisho #4]; LRC, in red: 拙居 {sekkyo}
portfolio: From Landscapes of the Four Seasons
signed: 戊午清和月古道人 {tsuchinoe-uma seiwazuki Kodōjin} (April 1918, Kodōjin)
text:
衣食非不拙　
憂道臥衡門　
金錢非不貴　
積善遺兒孫
Clothing, food' It is not that I am not clumsy,
But grieved at the world’s ways, I rest behind my gate.
As for money, it is not that I am not rich,
But to accumulate goodness, I will leave it to my children.
title: Landscape with Snow Scenery
